Abdel Rahim Alhassane Bonkan (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwarị 2002), nke a maara dị ka Rahim Alhasa, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-ano na azụ aka nri maka otu Primera Federación Rayo Majadahonda
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria, ọ na-agbara otu egwuregwu mba Niger bọọlụ.

Rahim Alhassane malitere ọrụ ya na Spain na Paracuellos Antamira na 2020, tupu ya abịnye aka na Rayo Majadahonda na Jenụwarị 2021. Na 1 Septemba 2021, ọ bịnyere aka na mgbazinye na Gimnástica Segoviana na Segunda División RFEF.
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria, Rahim Alhassane bụ onye Nijeria
Ọ malitere na ndị otu mba Niger na asọmpi asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2023 na Tanzania na 4 June 2022.
